view.name: system, basic, detailed, video, grid, gamecarousel

text.name: TextDescLong
text.text: Zinc is a command line emulator that focuses in emulating the ZN1, ZN2 and System 11 arcade hardware which are based on Playstation hardware.

text.name: TextDescShort
text.text: Zinc is a command line emulator that focuses in emulating the ZN1, ZN2 and System 11 arcade hardware which are based on Playstation hardware.
